examples.text: changes in the **chemical composition** of the atmosphere

definitions.definition: produced by or using processes that involve changes to atoms or molecules

examples.text: a **chemical plant** *(= a factory producing chemicals)*
Chemical treatment with chlorine provides some protection against contamination.

wordOrigin: late 16th cent.: from French chimique or modern Latin chimicus, chymicus, from medieval Latin alchymicus, from alchimia, from Arabic al-kīmiyā', from al ‘the’ + kīmiyā' (from Greek khēmia, khēmeia ‘art of transmuting metals’).
